attractions.title: SeaWorld San Diego
attractions.description: Marine life shows, thrill rides, aquariums & up-close encounters with dolphins, penguins & more.
attractions.address: 500 Sea World Dr, San Diego, CA 92109

attractions.title: San Diego Zoo
attractions.description: Zoo features giraffes, koalas, apes & more, plus a safari park for tours & a conservation society.

attractions.title: San Diego Zoo Safari Park
attractions.description: Visitor tours of a 1,800-acre wildlife sanctuary with over 300 species of African & Asian animals.
attractions.address: 15500 San Pasqual Valley Rd, Escondido, CA 92027

attractions.title: Birch Aquarium at Scripps
attractions.description: Interactive tide pools & exhibitions for all things under the sea in an oceanside building.
